Desc.entry: A community allotment run in partnership with Heeley City Farm and Sure Start. Providing an opportunity for local people to have a go at growing food and flowers, interact with their natural surroundings and learn about healthy eating. The allotment is open several times a week for various activities including gardening courses, family volunteer sessions and toddler time. These sessions take place all year round, providing activities for all ages and abilities helping to maintain the site and ensure it is full of flowers, fruit and vegetables.
